comments.text: Seems to be only on Mac, not sure why that would be.  In current trunk, the logs make it look like the following test causes the exception, but that's just a trick of the light.
comments.raw_text: Seems to be only on Mac, not sure why that would be.  In current trunk, the logs make it look like the following test causes the exception, but that's just a trick of the light.
So I mentioned this on IRC and now I have some confirmation - it may end up being an intermittent failure. It looks like there was another about:blank error - bug 707321.
